author: Nicole Wetsman
title: FDA authorizes first antibody-based test for COVID-19
description: Antibody tests are better at figuring out if someone was already sick with COVID-19 than if they currently have the disease. The FDA approval shows the agency thinks they’re still beneficial.
content:
Antibody tests arent great diagnostics
Photo: Xinhua / Shen Bohan via Getty Images
The Food and Drug Administration has issued its first authorization for a COVID-19 test that looks for antibodies in the blood, rather than for the virus in the nose or throa… [+2412 chars]
